name: StormSounds(AllNight)
0:
”Alexa open storm sounds all night”
”Alexa ask storm sounds all night to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: storm sounds all night
des: A storm is a brewing! Listen to it rage outside your window as you fall asleep quickly and deeply. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Storm Sounds All Night,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
